channel.title: CVE Feed for mlewand -- ckeditor-plugin-openlink
channel.description: The latest CVEs for mlewand -- ckeditor-plugin-openlink

item.title: CVE-2024-37888|2024-08-02T03:57:40.013Z -- mlewand -- ckeditor-plugin-openlink
item.description: The Open Link is a CKEditor plugin, extending context menu with a possibility to open link in a new tab. The vulnerability allowed to execute JavaScript code by abusing link href attribute. It affects all users using the Open Link plugin at version < **1.0.5**.
